articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Fighter Pilots' Takeoff and Landing Drill on Highway- Airfield
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Fighter Pilots' Takeoff and Landing Drill on Highway- Airfield
						
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, guided the takeoff and landing drill on a highway-airfield conducted by fighter pilots of KPA Air and Anti-Air Force Units 1017 and 458 honored with the title of O Jung Hup-led 7th Regiment.
					 After learning on the spot about the weather condition and the condition of the highway-airfield, he personally defined a flight duty and issued a sudden order to various type pursuit fighters to fly from the relevant operational airfields.
					
					 Watching the brave fighter pilots skillfully apply the combat flight method in the sky above the strange highway-airfield and admirably conduct landing with their independent judgment and decision, he praised them for their excellent piloting and displaying a high level of the art of aviation as intended by him.
					
					 Watching a pursuit fighter performing buzzing and wingover after making a zero-feet flight over the highway-airfield, he said: "I didn't give such task. Probably, he seems to boast his art of aviation before the Supreme Commander. How brave he is. That clearly shows he has steadily improved his art of aviation through his day-to-day intensive flight training." He showed such profound love and trust in him as telling the commanding officers accompanying him to highly praise the pilot and convey his salute to him.
					
					 The territorial air of the country should be protected irrespective of weather and time and a modern warfare is conducted under the worst conditions, he said, underscoring the need for the airmen to undergo a lot of trainings under the simulated conditions of an actual war despite the unfavorable situation with high ideological awareness so that they may successfully perform their combat duty under whatever situation and conditions anytime.
					
					 He called for fully preparing the airmen as members of a death-defying corps in the sky and able combat pilots capable of successfully fighting a modern warfare through intensive flight drills in the future.
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the C.C., the WPK, and O Il Jong and Han Kwang Sang, department directors of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Meets with Gold Medalists and Their Coaches
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Meets with Gold Medalists and Their Coaches
						
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, met together with Ri Sol Ju players who bagged gold medals at the 17th Asian Games and recent  world championships and their coaches.
					 They were women footballers, weightlifters Kim Un Guk, Om Yun Chol, Ri Jong Hwa and Kim Un Ju, boxer Jang Un Hui, wrestler Jong Hak Jin, shooter Kim Ji Song, heavy gymnastics player Kim Un Hyang and table tennis player Kim Hyok Bong, gold medalists at the  17th Asian Games, Hong Un Jong who grabbed gold medals at the  17th Asian Games and  the 45th Artistic Gymnastics World Championships, Yang Kyong Il, gold medalist at the 2014 World Wrestling Championships, Ri Se Gwang, gold medalist at the 45th Artistic Gymnastics World Championships, chief coach Kim Kwang Min and other coaches.
					
					 Kim Jong Un shook hands with the players and coaches one by one, congratulated them on their successes and had a warm talk with them.
					
					 He, on behalf of the Workers' Party of Korea, the DPRK government and all the Korean people, once again warmly congratulated and heartily thanked them for winning gold medals at the 17th Asian Games and world championships and thereby devotedly exalting the dignity of the DPRK and flying the flags of the DPRK.
					
					 He said the spectacular successes achieved recently were the great victories they won by waging struggles to protect the high dignity of the Korean people and the persevering fighting spirit they displayed at each match represented the stamina of the fighting service personnel and people of the country.
					
					 He noted that the players and coaches proved the validity and vitality of the party's plan for building a sports powerhouse through the 17th Asian Games and world championships, adding that the news of the victories won at the games instilled confidence in sure victory and optimism into all the service personnel and people and encouraged them to perform unprecedented miracles and innovations at the work sites for building a rich and powerful nation.
					
					 Learning that player Kim Jong was not able to have the honor to be present on this occasion as she was away from the country for an international competition, he promised to surely meet her when she was back home.
					
					 Expressing the expectation and conviction that they would fully demonstrate the dignity and might of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea at each international game for Asian and world titles, he had a photo session with them.
					
					 He hosted a banquet in honor of the players and coaches on the same day.
					
					 Also present there were Hwang Pyong So, Choe Ryong Hae, O Il Jong, Han Kwang Sang, Pak Myong Chol, Kim Yong Hun, O Kum Chol, Ri Jong Mu and other senior officials of the party, state and army.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Gifts to Scientists of State Academy of Sciences
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Gifts to Scientists of State Academy of Sciences
						
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un provided the scientists of the State Academy of Sciences with new flats in the Wisong Scientists Residential Quarter and sent them color TV sets, quilts and household utensils as gifts.
					 The meeting of conveying the gifts was held at the State Academy of Sciences on Sunday.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials of the State Academy of Sciences, scientists, technicians and teachers.

articles.title: Scientists of State Academy of Sciences Move to New Flats
articles.content:
Scientists of State Academy of Sciences Move to New Flats
						
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Scientists of the State Academy of Sciences started to move to new flats on Sunday, thanks to the loving care and benevolence of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					 Trucks carrying their household goods entered one after another the streets in the modern scenic residential quarter. 
					
					 Feasting their eyes on the good-looking apartment houses and public buildings decorated with colorful tiles, the scientists and their families were seized with boundless gratitude for Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The laughter of joy rang out from the residential quarter, another scenic spot in the era of Songun.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Choe Ryong Hae and other leading officials of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) congratulated them upon their moving to new flats.
					
					 They felt so grateful, looking round the interior of their flats with several excellent living rooms and kitchens with fashionable furniture.
					
					 They shared joy with scientists who received new flats and gave souvenirs to them.
					
					 They sat together with owners of flats, telling them about the devotion made by Kim Jong Un to bring about the auspicious event and the WPK's idea of attaching importance to science and training talents are.
					
					 Scientists and their families unfolded cheerful dances throughout the residential quarter.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Frustrating Imperialists' Ideological and Cultural Poisoning
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Frustrating Imperialists' Ideological and Cultural Poisoning 
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The young people in the progressive countries should look through the essence and dangerous nature of the imperialists' ideological and cultural poisoning and turn out in the struggle to frustrate it.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday observes this in an article.
					
					 In the new century the imperialists have become more cunning and vicious in their moves to imbue the young people with the reactionary and corrupt bourgeois ideology and culture, the paper says, and goes on:
					
					 By massively spreading the American view of value, bourgeois ideology and culture and false and fabricated data through the internet, the U.S. seeks to cause social chaos and political instability in some countries and make the young people harbor an illusion about the American culture and way of life. 
					
					 A lot of decadent films and videos of all kinds are in circulation mainly targeting the independent countries standing against imperialism and the young people.
					
					 The ideological and cultural poisoning by the U.S. is like an all-out war covering all spheres of social life. What is noteworthy in it is the smear campaign by radio.
					
					 The U.S. strategic design is to make young people mental cripples infected with virus of reactionary ideologies and corrupt bourgeois way of life and use them in its efforts to disintegrate those countries advocating independence against imperialism. This is proven by the beneath fact.
					
					 The young people in the East European countries which cleared the way for the imperialists' ideological and cultural poisoning in the past took the lead in bringing down the socialist system and betraying the country and people. 
					
					 The imperialists still stretch out the tentacles of ideological and cultural poisoning to the young people.

articles.title: Moral Corruption of Capitalism Can Never Be Concealed: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Moral Corruption of Capitalism Can Never Be Concealed: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- No matter what rhetoric it may let loose, capitalism can never cover up its incurable sickness--reactionary nature and corruption of its bourgeois morality, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an article.
					 Bourgeois idea and reactionary bourgeois morality based on extreme individualism have reigned in capitalist society, notes the article, and goes on:
					
					 "Private interests are inviolable", "I can live when I kill you"--this is the wrong way of thinking and viewpoint of those living in capitalist society in which bourgeois morality based on extreme individualism prevails.
					
					 Bourgeois morality in capitalist society, from its nature, inevitably incites the people to a jungle-law struggle for existence. "A man should become a wolf before other men", "He who robs the other by hook or by crook is a wise man"--this is the outlook on existence in capitalist society.
					
					 In capitalist society dominated by bourgeois view of value and morality the corrupt and depraved way of life prevails as it is further fostered by its reactionary rulers. So, in capitalist countries, various type reactionary ideas and decayed way of life are rampant to paralyze the sound mentality of people and make them ignorant. Such a mode of existence as the stronger preying upon the weaker has been encouraged there to be ridden by such social evils as immorality and corruption, murder and robbery, throwing the people into fear and uneasiness.
					
					 Moral vulgarity of capitalist society has reached an extreme phase. By no remedy can this be cured as long as capitalist system exists.
					
					 Inevitable is the collapse of capitalism festering with corrupt morality.

articles.title: New Operational Plan of U.S., S. Korea Censured
articles.content:
New Operational Plan of U.S., S. Korea Censured
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The U.S.-south Korea security consultative meeting will reportedly take place in Washington at the end of October.
					 Foreign reports say that the U.S. and south Korea are mapping out a new operational plan to jointly cope with "nuclear and ballistic missile threat from north Korea".
					
					 A commentary of Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this is an open challenge to the measures taken by the DPRK for self-defence, and an adventurous act of posing greater danger of a nuclear war to the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The operational plan which the U.S. alleges it pushes forward jointly with south Korea is, in fact, its own unilateral operational plan to mobilize all its combat forces with strike, monitor and defence missions, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. missile defense system is primarily targeted against big powers around Korea. The reason that the U.S. is keen to deploy in south Korea X-Band with the capacity of detecting targets within more than 1 000 km is to pressure and threaten those big powers around Korea.
					
					 Those powers are moving to defeat the U.S. military supremacy while channeling efforts into bolstering military capacity.
					
					 By inveigling south Korea into its missile defence system, the U.S. seeks to prevent the north-south ties from making progress and use them in its favor for escalating confrontation with those countries around Korea and sparking off strategic race. This reveals the U.S. black-hearted intention to expand the Cold War structure on the Korean Peninsula to the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 This indicates the U.S.-south Korea new joint operational plan is just a plan for expanding the Cold War.
					
					 It is the U.S. which will suffer a defeat in the Cold War in the 21st century. It is now falling into decline being denounced as the source of evil and kingpin of injustice on the international arena. The speed of its falling will be accelerated in the future.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces' Ridiculous Remarks Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Forces' Ridiculous Remarks Slammed
						
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Hwang Jun Guk, chief delegate of south Korea to the six-party talks, at a recent meeting uttered that "the north's nuclear adventure reduced all north Koreans to hostages of nukes" and "the north should step up the line of improving human rights and developing economy simultaneously, not the line of developing nukes and economy simultaneously".  Meanwhile, Yun Pyong Se, puppet minister of Foreign Affairs of south Korea, during his foreign trip, begged for international cooperation while urging "the north to scrap nuclear program".
					 Minju Joson Sunday in a commentary says in this regard: 
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces let loose a spate of coarse invectives against the DPRK while shelving the nuclear threat from the U.S. This fully revealed their true colors as pitiful and despicable stooges who cling to the coattails of foreign forces to prolong their remaining days through confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 They dared take issue with the DPRK's line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force, an act pursuant to the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK to disarm it, to all intents and purposes. It is also a revelation of their stepped-up confrontation racket to tarnish the image of the dignified DPRK through the frantic human rights campaign.
					
					 It is ridiculous that they begged for international cooperation while vociferating about someone's "nuclear abandonment".
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear deterrence is a pride of the whole nation as it keeps the Korean nation alive and makes it prosper. The ignorant puppet forces dare provoke the DPRK's nuclear deterrence while going about here and there. This is nothing but the last-ditch efforts of the colonial stooges who are lost to shame.

articles.title: U.S.-Japan-S. Korea Military Nexus Protested in South Korea
articles.content:
U.S.-Japan-S. Korea Military Nexus Protested in South Korea
						
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Hundreds of people of different circles including trade unionists and religionists in south Korea held a meeting to cope with the situation in Seoul on Oct. 16 and made public a declaration protesting the war-like moves that cause the military confrontation and conflict.
					 The declaration said:
					
					 Japan is stepping up the work to rearm itself and exercise the "right to collective self-defense" with the active backing of the U.S. which plans the establishment of the missile shield. 
					
					 After reinforcing its troops in Asia, the U.S. gives spur to the establishment of the missile shield. The south Korean authorities are taking the advantages of it. 
					
					 Recently the south Korean and U.S. authorities officially announced the share of the military information with Japan.
					
					 Deployment of THAAD in south Korea is making a headway as well. It is evident that the deployment of THAAD will cause the same military conflict and confrontation on the Korean Peninsula and in the rest of Northeast Asia as in the Cold War era.
					
					 The declaration concluded the military nexus should not be allowed as it would bring the tension and crisis.

articles.title: Bird Flu Breaks Out in South Korea
articles.content:
Bird Flu Breaks Out in South Korea
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Ducks were found to be infected with bird flu at duck farms in Sanpho-myon and Kumchon-myon in Raju City, South Jolla Province, south Korea, according to the south Korean KBS on Oct. 17. 
					 It was reported that many ducks were buried or disposed.

articles.title: Chongryon Representatives Protest against Japan's Move to Conceal Crimes Related to Forcible Drafting
articles.content:
Chongryon Representatives Protest against Japan's Move to Conceal Crimes Related to Forcible Drafting
						
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Ri Kwang Sang, chairman of the Nagano Prefectural Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), and other representatives visited the Nagano City Office of Nagano Prefecture, Japan on Oct. 9. They handed over a written request addressed to the mayor of Nagano City and the head of the city education committee in protest against the move of the Nagano City authorities to revise the content of a board that is hung at the entrance to the underground air-raid shelter "Imperial headquarters in Matsshiro". The shelter indicts the Japanese imperialists for their crimes of forcible drafting in the past.
					 The city authorities should not conceal the past crimes by removing the expression "forcible" on the board but make a clear probe into the historical facts in those days including the truth about forcible drafting, construction site and living conditions, they said.
					
					 Japan deserves denunciation by the international community as it has not made proper apology and reparation for the past crimes, they noted.

articles.title: Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Show Held in China
articles.content:
Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Show Held in China
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia show sponsored by Koreans in China was held in Hunchun, China on October 5 on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Displayed at the venue of the show were flowers of the sun reflecting the profound reverence of all people for the peerless great persons against the background of Lake Chon of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Present at the show were Cha Sang Bo, vice-chairman of the General Association of Koreans in China, and other officials of the association, Koreans in China, the DPRK deputy consul general in Shenyang, members of the DPRK branch staying in Hunchun and foreigners.
					
					 Speeches were made at the show.
					
					 The speakers said it is great honor to hold the show of flowers of the sun in Hunchun which is associated with the feats performed by President Kim Il Sung during the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of the WPK.
					
					 The Korean people are bringing about leaping progress and innovations in building a thriving nation under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, holding the President and leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem for all ages, they noted.
					
					 There are many beautiful and rare flowers in the world but Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia are the only famous flowers which go by the august names of the peerless great persons, they said.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits for National Reunification Introduced by Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits for National Reunification Introduced by Nigerian Organization
						
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted an article titled "Kim Il Sung, for reunified Korea" on its website on October 3 on the occasion of the 34th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo (DFRK).
					 The website in a preface said that the Korean nation has dynamically advanced the reunification cause despite the evermore undisguised obstructive maneuvers and challenges of the separatist forces at home and abroad, adding this would be unthinkable without the exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung who made great efforts for the reunification of the Korean nation.
					
					 It noted in an article subtitled "In the transparent idea of great national unity":
					
					 Kim Il Sung always put the great national unity above all and made sure that everything was subordinated to it to realize the reunification of the country.
					
					 He thought that it is necessary to transcend differences of ideology, ism and social systems between the north and the south to achieve the great national unity and it is most important to put the interests of the nation above all.
					
					 He also set forth the three principles of national reunification--independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity--which became the core of the historical July 4 joint statement.
					
					 The ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation set forth by him in April 1993 serves as a great programme of the national unity for the Korean people aspiring for reunification.
					
					 It is called three charters for national reunification together with the three principles of national reunification and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo.
					
					 The website said that he clarified the overall features of reunified Korea by setting forth the proposal at the Sixth Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea in October 1980.
					
					 It said in an article with subtitle "Even in the last days of his life" that he left the last autograph of his life on a document related to the national reunification.

articles.title: Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Work Held in Different Countries
articles.content:
Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Work Held in Different Countries
						
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Seminars on leader Kim Jong Il's work "Socialism Is a Science" were held in Italy, Austria and Bangladesh between October 8 and 10.
					 Displayed at the venues of the seminars were works of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and books introducing the true picture of Songun Korea. 
					
					 The secretary of the communist youth organization under the Communist Reconstruction Party of Italy said that Kim Jong Il's idea is being successfully realized in socialist Korea, calling for deeply studying his work to find out the way of realizing the socialist cause.
					
					 The secretary of a provincial committee of the party said that when the imperialists were vociferating about "total end of socialism", Kim Jong Il conducted energetic ideological and theoretical activities, instilling the conviction of socialism into the world progressives and firmly consolidating the Workers' Party of Korea into the ever-victorious and invincible party and the DPRK into a socialist fortress.
					
					 The chief of the Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea in Vienna noted that Kim Jong Il's work is a historic document which defended the scientific accuracy and truth of socialism and powerfully proved its tremendous validity and vitality.
					
					 The chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy and other speakers praised Kim Jong Il for providing the immortal guidelines for accomplishing the socialist cause, expressing belief that the Korean people would certainly build a thriving nation under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Benin
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Benin
						
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The Benin National Committee for Remembering General Kim Jong Il was inaugurated in Cotonou on Oct. 13.
					 Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader", was elected chairman of the remembrance committee at the inaugural ceremony.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events praising the feats of leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the third anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: DIU Introduced by British Organizations
articles.content:
DIU Introduced by British Organizations
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The idea and line of Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU) have been successfully inherited by the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said this in a joint statement on Oct. 13 on the occasion of the 88th anniversary of the formation of DIU by President Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 The formation of DIU served as an occasion which made the communists of the new generation of Korea break with the old ideas such as factionalism, flunkeyism and dogmatism and turn out in accomplishing the cause of building the revolutionary working-class party, the statement said.
					
					 DIU declared with pride that its fighting aim was to achieve the liberation and independence of Korea, carry out the socialist revolution and, furthermore, build socialism and communism, it noted.
					
					 The WPK is successfully carrying out the programme and idea of DIU, holding high the banner of the great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, it said.

articles.title: WPK Lauded by Angolan Figures
articles.content:
WPK Lauded by Angolan Figures
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- There took place events in Angola to mark the 17th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), the 69th founding anniversary of the WPK and the 88th anniversary of the formation of Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU).
					 Round-table talks, lectures, reading session and other events were held in Cabinda and other provinces of Angola more than 20 times between Oct. 7 and 9.
					
					 The participants in the events said that President Kim Il Sung made the firm organizational and ideological preparations for founding the party in the flames of the grim anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, founded the WPK on their basis right after the liberation of Korea and enhanced the leading function and role of the party in every way, successfully leading the revolution and construction.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il further strengthened the WPK into the eternal party of the President, an ideological pure entity, an integral organization and the mother party enjoying absolute support and trust of the people, they noted.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un is successfully carrying forward and accomplishing the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il without an inch of deflection, they said, expressing the belief that the Korean people would always emerge victorious thanks to the great party.

articles.title: WPK's History Introduced by Foreign Papers
articles.content:
WPK's History Introduced by Foreign Papers
						
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Foreign papers carried special write-ups to mark the 17th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 69th founding anniversary of the WPK.
					 Kuwait Times on Oct. 12 carried an article titled "Unity and cohesion of party provide sure guarantee for final victory of Korean revolution" illustrated with a photo of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The WPK has waged a persistent struggle for achieving the unity and cohesion of the party under the banner of the Juche idea, it said, and went on:
					
					 In the first period when he embarked upon the road of the revolution, President Kim Il Sung called for achieving the revolutionary unity based on one ideology and purpose.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il set it as the fundamental principle and core of the party work to achieve the unity and cohesion of the party centering around the leader and strengthened the unity and cohesion of the party based on the revolutionary outlook on the leader.
					
					 Kim Jong Un set it as the supreme programme of the WPK to model the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and is wisely leading the struggle to strengthen the party.
					
					 The Egyptian paper Al-Misaiya on Oct. 9 carried an article titled "Ever-victorious WPK" which introduced the feats performed by the WPK for the era and revolution.
					
					 The Algerian paper Saut Al Ahrar on Oct. 11 carried an article titled "On the occasion of 69th founding anniversary of WPK, for realizing people's dream".
					
					 It said that the Korean people are enjoying happiness thanks to the popular policies such as free medical care and free educational system as there is the WPK.

articles.title: Seminars on Kim Jong Un's Work Held Abroad
articles.content:
Seminars on Kim Jong Un's Work Held Abroad
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Seminars on supreme leader Kim Jong Un's works were held by the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain and by a company of Malaysia on October 5 and 6 to mark the 17th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 69th founding anniversary of the WPK.
					 At the seminars on his works "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" and "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" members of the Korean Friendship Association and other speakers praised President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for founding the WPK and strengthening it into the invincible revolutionary party.
					
					 They expressed the conviction that the Korean people are sure to win the final victory as they are invariably advancing along the road of independence, Songun and socialism, rallied close around Kim Jong Un.
					
					 At the seminar on his work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" directors of the board of a company of Malaysia said that Kim Jong Il strengthened the WPK into the party of the President, adding that the WPK could win only victories in its history as it was led by the President and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They noted that the WPK is confidently advancing along the road chosen by itself in the complicated international situation as it is led by Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Beninese Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Beninese Figure
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader", praised the feats performed by leader Kim Jong Il at an inaugural ceremony of the Benin National Committee for Remembering General Kim Jong Il held in Cotonou on Oct. 13.
					 He said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il consolidated the political and ideological position of the DPRK as firm as a rock.
					
					 He put forward the Korean People's Army (KPA) as the pillar for accomplishing the socialist cause and the main force of the revolution and paid deep attention to firmly building up the political force of the Korean society with the KPA as the core. He rallied the broad masses around the Workers' Party of Korea and made all service personnel and people a harmonious whole sharing the idea and destiny with the party with his politics of love and trust. So, the DPRK has achieved the single-minded unity of the whole society, more powerful than nukes and demonstrated its might as a political and ideological power that remains undeterred by any storm.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Letter Posted by German Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Letter Posted by German Organization on Its Website
						
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany posted on its website on Oct. 12 "Young People, Be Vanguard Fighters Unfailingly Faithful to the Party's Revolutionary Cause of Songun", the letter sent by supreme leader Kim Jong Un to those attending the Fourth Conference of Primary Officials of Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League on Sept. 18, Juche 103 (2014).
					 The letter clarifies the fact that young Koreans have covered the glorious path, decorating the annals of the revolution with heroic feats and proud victories under the wise guidance and benevolent care of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for the young Korean people to successfully play the role as young vanguard of the party in the on-going historic advance and the ways to do so.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicios de despegue y aterrizaje de aviadores de unidades de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicios de despegue y aterrizaje de aviadores de unidades de EPC
						
Pyongyang, 19 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio los ejercicios de despegue y aterrizaje en el aeropuerto de carretera de los pilotos de la Unidad 1017 y la 458 de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del EPC, galardonadas con el titulo de Septimo Regimiento de O Jung Hup.
					Se entero en el mismo lugar de la condicion meteologica y del estado del aeropuerto de carretera, establecio directamente el deber de vuelo y llamo de repente los cazas de varios tipos desde los correspondientes aeropuertos de operacion.
					
					Al ver aspectos de los pilotos quienes hayan realizado con habilidad sobre el cielo de desconocido aeropuerto de carretera los metodos de control de vuelo y aterrizado elegantemente con su decision autoctona, senalo que ellos volaron bien y se dotaron de alta aeronautica como el deseaba.
					
					Viendo un caza que realiza en la altura baja el movimiento dificil pasando el cielo del aeropuerto de carretera dijo que parece que el piloto queria mostrar su aeronautica ante el Comandante Supremo aunque no le dio este deber y el tiene alta aeronautica haciendo en el tiempo ordinario los ejercicios de vuelo de alta intensidad y destaco a los comandantes acompanantes que evaluen altamente a aquel piloto valiente y le transmiten su saludo.
					
					Enseno que los pilotos deben hacer en las condiciones desfavorables muchos ejercicios con la gran decision ideologica para cumplir magnificamente en cualesquier estados y condiciones desfavorables sus deberes aereos combatientes porque la defensa aerea de la patria se desarrolla sin relacion con el tiempo y tambien la guerra contemporanea se libra en las condiciones mas graves.
					
					Subrayo que se debe hacer los ejercicios de vuelo para que los pilotos se formen como primeros combatientes de choque y aviadores talentosos capaces de enfrentarse habilmente con la guerra contemporanea.
					
					Le acompanaron el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el secretario del CC del PTC Choe Ryong Hae y los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC O Il Jong y Han Kwang Sang.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un se reune con jugadores y entrenadores
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un se reune con jugadores y entrenadores
Pyongyang, 19 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, junto con Ri Sol Ju se reunio con los jugadores quienes ganaron medallas de oro en los XVII Juegos Asiaticos y recientes campeonatos mundiales y sus entrenadores.
					En la ocasion participaron las futbolistas, los pesistas Kim Un Guk, Om Yun Chol, Ri Jong Hwa y Kim Un Ju, la boxeadora Jang Un Hui, el luchador Jong Hak Jin, el tirador Kim Ji Song, la gimnasta de aparatos Kim Un Hyang, el jugador de ping-pong Kim Hyok Bong, quienes se adjudicaron primeros en los XVII Juegos Asiaticos, Hong Un Jong, ganadora en mismos juegos y en el 45o Campeonato Mundial de Gimnasia de Aparatos, Ri Se Gwang en dicho campeonato, Yang Kyong Il en el Campeonato Mundial de Lucha 2014 y los entrenadores incluido el entrenador-jefe Kim Kwang Min.
					
					El Mariscal felicito los exitos de competencia de ellos tomando sus manos y departio cordialmente con ellos.
					
					En representacion del PTC, el gobierno de la RPDC y todo el pueblo coreano el volvio a felicitar y dar agradecimiento a los jugadores y los entrenadores quienes han defendido a ultranza gran imagen de la RPDC y flameado la bandera nacional logrando primeros lugares en dichos juegos y campeonatos.
					
					Dijo que tales exitos sorprendentes son la gran victoria ganada con la alta dignidad del pueblo coreano y la combatividad demostrada en las competencias mostro el espiritu de nuestro ejercito y pueblo.
					
					Senalo que a traves de los juegos y los campeonatos los jugadores y entrenadores coreanos probaron la justicia y la vitalidad del proposito del partido de construir una potencia de deportes y agrego que la noticia de la victoria dio a todo el ejercito y el pueblo la invencible fe y el optimismo y posibilito registrar en los lugares de la construccion de la patria prospera milagros e innovaciones sin precedentes.
					
					Prometio que se encontrara con Kim Jong, jugadora de ping-pong quien participa en una competencia internacional, cuando ella regresa a la patria.
					
					Expreso la esperanza y la conviccion de que los jugadores y los entrenadores manifestaran a todo el mundo la dignidad y el poderio de la nacion de Kim Il Sung y Corea de Kim Jong Il en las competencias internacionales para tomar heguemonia asiatica y la mundial y se fotografio junto con ellos.
					
					El mismo dia, el Mariscal ofrecio el banquete en honor de los jugadores y entrenadores.
					
					Participaron en la ocasion Hwang Pyong So, Choe Ryong Hae, O Il Jong, Han Kwang Sang, Pak Myong Chol, Kim Yong Hun, O Kum Chol, Ri Jong Mu y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito.
